title: Coleen Nolan wants Whoopi Goldberg to be permanent Loose Women panelist as she wears customised gift on The View
text:
Coleen Nolan wants Whoopi Goldberg to be permanent Loose Women panelist as she wears customised gift on The View The Sister Act actress was gifted Converse by the ITV show last week Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Whoopi Goldberg wears Loose Women shoes on The View Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Whoopi Goldberg made quite the impression on Loose Women when she was on the show last week. 
The Sister Act star was gifted a pair of Loose Women-customised Converse shoes by Andrea McLean, Linda Robson, Martine McCutcheon and Anne Diamond when she was on the ITV show. 
She promised she’d wear them on her programme The View - the US version of Loose Women - when she returned to the show this week. 
And it was revealed in a clip on today’s show, she kept to her promise! Read More Whoopi Goldberg was gifted customised Converse on Loose Women (Photo: Rex Features) She promised she'd wear them on The View (Photo: Rex Features) But did she keep her promise? (Photo: Rex Features) 
Showing off her trainers to her co-hosts, Whoopi confessed the Loose Women were “lovely”. 
Then, joking about her sore throat, she added: “I’ve had worse things in my mouth!” 
The ladies on The View looked shocked Whoopi had returned from the UK with such a naughty sense of humour. Read More
